Part of the problem was that Michael was trying to cut costs at KPMG while also leading a ruthless cull of underperforming staff. Whether or not he went too far, the strategy caused huge tensions.

articles.title: Woman left penniless after being tricked out of £40,000 by online dating lover - Mirror Online
articles.description: Linda, whose name has been changed to protect her anonymity, shared her entire life savings with her online partner after he begged for financial help to pay for his dad's life-saving treatment
articles.content:
A woman whose life fell apart after she lost £40,000 to a man she met on a dating website, has urged others to watch out for the warning signs that could mean you're being defrauded.
